FuncDef: This command configures the hold time before re-using a RADIUS server.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of seconds for the hold down time. Values-1 to 59.
Specifies the number of minutes for the hold down time. Values-1 to 59.
Specifies the number of hours for the hold down time. Values-1 to 23.
Specifies the number of days for the hold down time. Values-1 to 1.
